Articles.Content:
The launch vehicle and Multipurpose vehicle packed away awaiting launch: http://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/792939615745435004/E3DB15FA9348FBAE5358FCF9494C1CA09D11E760/

Note the rocket is open to improvement.

Multipurpose vehicle just after final separation: http://cloud-3.steampowered.com/ugc/792939615745438360/15732E668893AD1C508C97A195D73D709168102E/

Front view of Multipurpose launch vehicle: http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/792939615745439490/D0D5641DBDA66A3BFC076303266713A00517A716/

Download link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/nvd6yrutvq6vc5f/SiaComOne.craft
Wow, I defiantly will be copi... I mean reverse engineering this for my own use. But it looks like the launcher might be a bit overkill? Oh well it is a good job anyways.

Wow, I defiantly will be copi... I mean reverse engineering this for my own use. But it looks like the launcher might be a bit overkill? Oh well it is a good job anyways.

The launcher is just to get into whatever orbit you want. Didn't really put much thought into it. Feel free to improve anything I release.

if you do modify, could you post it here? It would be interesting to see how people modify and use desgins like these.

Edited April 4, 2014 by ProGamerGov
This thing is extremely useful. I sometimes stick tanks on the docking ports to move fuel between spacecraft or between a space craft and a space station.
Is there a 1-man capsule in there, or is it a probe?
Jebediah, that launch vehicle. What are you compensating for?
